title: One Bert Show Member Owes A Listener An Apology + Clear My Wish List
description:
It happens sometimes we mess up and disappoint listeners. It recently happened to our Producer Keity, and today she wants to make things right with a public apology.
Plus, we need your help clearing another teacher's wishlist. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
